content: कष् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (कषति-ते, कषित) {@--1@} To rub, scratch, scrape; समूलकाषं कषति Sk; <ls>Bk. 3. 49.</ls> {@--2@} To test, try, rub on a touch-stone (as gold); छदहेम कषन्निवालसत्कषपाषाणनिभे नभस्तले <ls>N. 2. 69</ls>. {@--3@} To injure, destroy. {@--4@} To itch. {@--5@} To leap. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> (काषयति) To hurt.
